function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low-income level contributing to worse mental health","Impact":"Increased depressive symptoms and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and resources for low-income individuals","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"Low-income individuals, students, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Marital status and living alone associated with increased depression","Impact":"Higher rates of depression for singles, divorcees, widowers, and people living alone","Mitigation":"Promote social connections and support for individuals living alone","Technologies":"Social networking platforms, community support groups","People":"Singles, divorcees, widowers, people living alone","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Low level of education associated with higher depressive symptoms","Impact":"Increased depressive symptoms for individuals with low education levels","Mitigation":"Improve access to education and mental health resources for individuals with low education levels","Technologies":"Online education platforms, mental health education programs","People":"Individuals with low education levels","Owner":"Educational institutions, government"}]}
